title: White House Mulls Investigation into China Patent Theft (Audio)
itunes:title: White House Mulls Investigation into China Patent Theft (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Andrew Mayeda, a global trade reporter for Bloomberg News, discusses plans by U.S. officials to investigate China for alleged intellectual property violations for products owned by U.S. companies and individuals. He speaks with June Grasso on Bloomberg Radio's "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
